content.question: A particle moves along the x-axis so that its velocity at any time t ≧ 0 is given by v(t) = 1 − sin(2πt). (a) Find the acceleration a(t) of the particle at any time t.

frqParts.text: A particle moves along the x-axis so that its velocity at any time t ≧ 0 is given by v(t) = 1 − sin(2πt). (a) Find the acceleration a(t) of the particle at any time t.
(b) Find all values of t, 0 ≦ t ≦ 2, for which the particle is at rest.
(c) Find the position x(t) of the particle at any time t if x(0) = 0.
